Main Panel$(li)Offset: Adjust docking distance (dynamic anchor's value is used).$(li)Protocol: Channel filter.$(li)is_running: Enable/disable.$(li)is_static: Static/dynamic mode (requires is_running).

Controller Panel $(br2)Adjust PID parameters for 3D rotation/position control. Test within default ranges.
Notes $(br2)Spatial anchors on dynamic structures default to Static mode. Use controllers to override.
